nodes.text: The Lariat of Armistice was an unbreakable rope dating back to the time of the Mystic Nine. By the High Republic Era, the lariat was in the possession of the Jedi Order, and was part of Secrets of the Jedi, an exhibit displayed at the Starlight Pavilion during the Valo Republic Fair. When the Fair was attacked by the Nihil, the Jedi archivist OrbaLin and the journalist Rhil Dairo captured and restrained the Lamproid pirate Quin Amarant with the lariat.
